website_summaries.verdict: Simple recipe with just one ingredient, which is beneficial for dogs with allergies. Also good for cats.
pros: Uses just one protein that's freeze-dried to deliver a texture and taste dogs love
Protein is sourced from and manufactured in America
Works for both dogs and cats, which is smart for multi-pet homes
cons: Texture becomes hard to chew when not fresh

customer_reviews.title: My cats just love love love Whole Life - Just One
customer_reviews.text: I use the sprinkles in the morning to encourage them to finish their morning fare. And they get a whole treat for "lunch." I like the fact that there are no additives, it's just freeze-dried chicken breast, doesn't put on unwanted weight, is a healthy protein snack, and they get really excited and run to the kitchen when they hear me open the bag. My one objection is that they fill an inner bag with air that breaks down the whole pieces and I have more "sprinkles" and fewer snacks. I would prefer they keep the product in the original bag and just use better packing materials in the box. Then, I would hope, perhaps, to have more bite-size pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and my cats love it. I have no problem with the product itself. However, this is the first time I ordered it from Amazon. I usually buy it locally and the bag is full of large pieces. This time, there was a lot of powder and really small pieces. I think that multiple shippings (from manufacturer to seller to Amazon to me) is the cause of product crumbling. It might be a product best bought locally. I'll give it one more try to determine if my theory is correct.
customer_reviews.author: gray vegan

customer_reviews.title: Chicken Chunks to Dust
customer_reviews.text: So, dog loves them but paying for a lot of chicken dust. First purchase was in November. December the price had gone up by $10 !!, No same thing is $35! Doubled in 3 months.... Just lost this customer
customer_reviews.author: Rescue A Dog

customer_reviews.title: IS A HIT WITH 50% OF GANG!
customer_reviews.text: One dog ADORES this...especially reconstituted in water or chicken broth. The other won’t touch it. I tasted it. I swear it tastes like cooked chicken! It is REALLY great to give medicine to my older pup in! I soak in liquid, break apart, mash it up and put pill inside, and pup eats from fingers. No problem! I will have these on hand from now on! Oh! One cat likes. Haven’t fed to everyone yet.
customer_reviews.author: Robin H.

customer_reviews.title: Inedible for my dog
customer_reviews.text: We are happy to order this product all the time, but this time it’s all hard like concrete. It is inedible for my dog. Usually it is easy to break apart and often falls apart At the touch. I would like a new one.
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD F.

customer_reviews.title: All 5 cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: All 5 love it. I had bought the chicken before and they love the chicken too, however, this is the better value for the money as it is a little harder than the chicken and doesn't shred as much, so I was able to use more of it. At the end of the freeze-dried chicken I had a lot of dust, not as much with the liver.
customer_reviews.author: Ceejade

customer_reviews.title: Price almost doubled!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these treats but $69 a bag? I've been purchasing them for the past couple of years and the price has always been around $40. Will go with one of the other brands at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Healthy Treat for All Carnivores/Omnivores
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my ferrets and my roommate's cats because it is cheaper to buy the dog size, and it is the same product. They all love their chicken and go nuts for it. I also feel good about giving it because it lets me bump up the ferrets' daily protein intake. My biggest complaint with it is it has a tendency to crumble, so when you get to the bottom of the bag, there is a lot of dust left. However, this can be mixed in with food so it's not a total loss.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Chicken that is ready to feed my dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great product for dog training, is freeze dried so does not go bad. Great for dogs with allergies, and has no added ingredients! I also keep them in my cupboard just in case we have someone with a bad tummy, I will cook some rice for my dog and add a small handful of this freeze dried chicken, mix it together, the chicken gets soft and it makes a nice bland diet to give my dog. Many options available.
customer_reviews.author: run2it

customer_reviews.title: price
customer_reviews.text: with your price increase I no longer will be purchasing your dried chicken
customer_reviews.author: Michael Eaker

customer_reviews.title: A Nutritious Treat
customer_reviews.text: Two out of our 4 cats love this. They know when it’s treat time, and they cry for it. It can be messy because I break the large pieces into smaller ones and it leaves dust and crumbs. To avoid a mess, I feed them in a bowl. I’m hoping that the other two will give it a try someday. It’s a good nutritious supplement to their diet. I hate feeding them those addictive junk treats that all cats seem to love.
customer_reviews.author: gretchen

customer_reviews.title: They crumble and fall apart
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this was a big package since my cats and dogs all like freeze dried treats. They were pretty large sized strips of chicken, but when I tried to break them down they disintegrated into dust pretty much. I get that they are freeze dried but I have had other brands that I can break apart without that happening. The animals did love these though and were thrilled anytime I pulled the bag out.
customer_reviews.author: M. WalkerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My Cat loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I break up the pieces and add a little water and he devours them. They’re a little pricey but this big bag lasts a while
customer_reviews.author: Keith Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my kitty wanted.
customer_reviews.text: My Tuxedo is absolutely mad about these chicken treats. if I let him, he'd eat them exclusively. Right now, he refuses to eat his wet "no grain meat food" unless I dust it with the freeze-dried chicken & if he eats the top layer, he cries for more of the freeze-dried chicken before finishing his meal. He is totally addicted & I let him have more than I should because is is 100% chicken, with no additives. Love, love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Graham

customer_reviews.title: Cat's love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a "treat" for our cats who live it. We just say "chicken!" and they come running. From the US, would not purchase otherwise for safety and quality concerns.
customer_reviews.author: JKMYB

customer_reviews.title: i like that they're dusty
customer_reviews.text: People complain about the dust but that's what I go for - I blend these up int he blender and sprinkle them on top of "healthy" foods my cats don't prefer (like Newman's organic or wellness) and they gobble it up - Sprinkle this on anythign the cats don't want to eat and thtey love it
customer_reviews.author: Charity June

customer_reviews.title: I love em, and my kittens do too!
customer_reviews.text: These are not cheap, but my kittens love them, and they've really helped in the training process. I don't have to think twice about the negative affects of too many treats - training them to scratch in the right places, and to come when I call is an ongoing process - so they get these treats a lot. They're 100% pure freeze-dried chicken, so I know they're healthy. I buy them in the largest size available which helps to keep the cost a little lower.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Best freeze-dried chicken treats EVER!
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered this after trying a smaller bag at a pet store. She’s tried other brands, but others can have stale, and/or a mixture of light & dark chicken - sometimes with either sharp or soggy pieces. My wife said that THIS brand is consistently perfect and our “many” cats go crazy at treat time! Even some who’ve never been interested in treats show up for these.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Austin

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I like that we are giving our dogs real chicken. A little bit of water added to it helps our dogs swallow it better.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Johnston

customer_reviews.title: My cats are addicted to this!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness it is wholesome, because my cats beg for it. The majority of the pieces are tender enough to break into smaller bits. I downgraded the rating from 5 to 4 stars because it is now vacuum packed rather than in a protective cardboard box. While somewhat greener in packaging, I feel it breaks the treats more, and a lot of the package is crumbled to powder. The cats will eat the powder as a garnish over their wet food, but it makes them sneeze.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Whole Life Pet Single Ingredient (Chicken)
customer_reviews.text: This is a very healthy and safe alternative for our two cats. There are no fillers, just pure chicken. It's also made in the USA, not in China, so that is reassuring. This is pure and tasty protein to keep our cats well and happy! The only issue that I have, since the chicken is vacuumed packed into a big block in a plastic bag, is trying to separate chunks of it neatly. The packaging from about year ago was entirely different than it is now. I thought that it was easier to handle back then. However, this food is great for my cats!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Olds

customer_reviews.title: Can't get enough for my cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves these. From a kitten he has had a hard time chewing hard food/treats so I gave these a try. He eats them like air but still eats his regular cat food. They do make a mess though with a fine dusting of chicken around the bowl. I even give him the 'dust' from the bottom. He licks the bowl clean while the dust blows from his breath as he vigorously attacks the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Terri S

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Powder these days
customer_reviews.text: So my pets love these treats, BUT as time as gone on I end up with a lot of powder. I love spoiling my pets and have switched to other things as not much to do with a bag of powder. For my big dog I got some Full Moon chicken jerky and the cats oddly Nutristore freeze dried chicken.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Great for kitties
customer_reviews.text: Wish the price was lower for the amount that's in the bag. Product is top notch though.
customer_reviews.author: Tucsonian

customer_reviews.title: My cats' favorite treat!
customer_reviews.text: In an effort to preserve them through shipping they air sealed the contents which caused them to break down and I have a large bag of "sprinkles" which I use on their morning meal. Unfortunate. But the manufacturer should know this and package them differently.
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: What Happened To Quality Control?
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these on Amazon for several years, because my 20 year old cat likes them. The last two times I ordered, the bag had more dust than chicken pieces, and the pieces that were there were small and hard. They felt more like dried gristle than chicken. My cat had trouble chewing and eating them, compared to the original fluffy, soft ones I used to get, so I switched to another brand. Guess what - the others are like these were in the old days,and they appear to cost less to boot! My cat loves the new brand, and my vet doesn't even carry Whole Life anymore. Bye - bye, Whole Life.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gale

customer_reviews.title: MY BABY KITTY LOVES THIS AND I FEEL GOOD FEEDING HER THIS HIGH QUALITY AMERICAN PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: KITTY CRACK !!! MY BABY KITTY LOVES THIS AND I FEEL GOOD FEEDING HER THIS HIGH QUALITY AMERICAN PRODUCT. I KEEP IT IN THE FRIDGE TO KEEP CRUNCHY - HUMIDITY IS NOT GOOD FOR THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Animal lover

customer_reviews.title: ... because it's just chicken and nothing else so it's super healthy. I've never had a bad bag of ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat really likes these treats and so do I because it's just chicken and nothing else so it's super healthy. I've never had a bad bag of these treats unlike some other freeze dried treats I've tried. They are expensive but it lasts a long time for me and I think it's worth it for the quality and the fact that they're healthy.
customer_reviews.author: madmax

customer_reviews.title: My fussy cat is addicted!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is an extremely picky eater but literally cries until I give him some chicken pieces! I add a little water but one day he got his head INTO the bag and was devouring them dry. They have a very soft texture - break apart easily.
customer_reviews.author: GGP

customer_reviews.title: Great Treat for Pets - dog and cat
customer_reviews.text: Our pets (dog and cats) absolutely love this product. BE AWARE, they will avoid their "regular" food if they think that they are getting the chicken strips. Use to purchase directly from manufacturer and have been using them as a treat for a couple of years. It is a natural product without by products. They line up when we pull this out of the pantry! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M G

customer_reviews.title: Four stars because my cats and dog all love these, but even in the box
customer_reviews.text: Four stars because my cats and dog all love these, but even in the box, there are way too many crumbs and powder to give this a five star review. I had hoped to get less powder in the box, but nope! We end up using the dust on their food, which is good, but then I have to buy more treats for them for after a brushing, nail clipping etc. They are a bit high priced which again, makes me cringe when I have to buy more and there is more dust/powder in he bag than I care to have.
customer_reviews.author: D. Castellano

customer_reviews.title: Spiky, hard chicken
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these treats. I have 3 cats and have been buying this product for years. The last 3 packages have been inundated with spiky, hard pieces that would choke my cats. I break them up and place the hard ones aside. Between the 3 bags 3/4 of it was wasted. I'm going to have to find another company if it doesn't change. These were really below expectations.
customer_reviews.author: LEE

customer_reviews.title: I received mostly just a bag of dust. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I received mostly just a bag of dust. I used it to top my cats' dinners, but I had ordered this wanting a cat treat, not a powdered food topping. I understand they vacuum seal the bags now, so this is not supposed to be as much of an issue. But in the meantime I did find other locally available treats that we've been using and loving, so I'm not sure I'll try these again.
customer_reviews.author: Athalea25

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.  Cats LOVE them.
customer_reviews.text: All of my cats love these! We were using another freeze dried chicken that they really liked, but these are preferred. They are softer as well, so more easily turn to powder. But they don't care, they lick the bowls clean. We will keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: CyndiLouWho

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA- my cats love it
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product at a cat show several years ago and have been using ever since! The quality is excellent and should NOT be associated with non-USA products which are questionable and possibly contain toxic ingredients to pets. People (human beings!) at the cat show were even eating this dehydrated chicken! My cats have me trained! In the early evening they begin crying for their Whole Life treats! I have 1 large and 1 small bag auto shipped every month. I believe this company also makes dehydrated food for the US military.
customer_reviews.author: Gaylan K. Frederic

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My fussy Himalayan just goes crazy for pieces of this chicken. He doesn't eat any other dry food. I was concerned because many of the pieces in the bag are broken down into tiny specs, and I was concerned about wasting so much of the food. I now call it frosting and put these tiny pieces on top of his wet food Weruva Paw Licking Chicken and he devours all of it. He knows the word "frosting" and waits patiently for me to sprinkle some of it on top of his wet food. I use the larger pieces as treats. Great product especially for fussy cats! Buying the large bag from Amazon saves me at least $12.
customer_reviews.author: SheilaG

customer_reviews.title: Great treat that Cats and Dogs love
customer_reviews.text: We've been giving these to our cats for about 3 years now. They absolutely LOVE them. There's not a lot of consistency to the size of the pieces, but that's no issue. They break apart fairly easily. Since they're freeze dried they will produce powder when broken and when you're down to just a few bits left there's a lot of powder left in the bottom of the bag. That's no problem either, since you can put the powder into a little bowl, add some hot water, stir and TADA. Chicken gravy! The only Con is that it is expensive compared to processed treats, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Trey D.

customer_reviews.title: A miracle snack
customer_reviews.text: This product originally came to us as a gift from a family member. Our cat was understandably skeptical. So, we put some water in a small bowl to rehydrate a few chunks and put it on the floor. All of a sudden, it was as if the skies opened up and there was sunlight everywhere. This has been a go-to treat ever since. Seriously, I believe any cat would love this. Not sure if you want to serve it dry, though.
customer_reviews.author: C. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great as a Treat Or To Get  The Cats to Eat Other Catfood
customer_reviews.text: Added from previous review - Unlike some other who have complained about the size of the pieces, I have squashed the pieces so that I can sprinkle it on top of the cat's food. It gets them both to eat the their wet better than with the food alone. My cats love this and according to the ingredient list it doesn't have anything bad for my furballs. I often give it to them as a mid-day treat or a late evening snack, and they gobble it up. HOWEVER, it used to come in a resealable pouch -- now it does not. I've downgraded my review one star because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Aircarl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but expensive
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this as a treat. It's natural and very healthy. However, it is expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Healthy Snack Our Cats Love!
customer_reviews.text: We feed our cats 3 times a day and then give them treats at 9:00 pm which includes treats for hair balls but their favorites are the Whole Life Freeze Dried Chicken and Turkey. We keep any crums and use them for a topper for their regular raw diet food. We break the pieces up into smaller pieces to make it last longer. Our cats love it so much they will lick any crums up that they find. If you are looking for a great healthy product to reward your cat with give Whole Life Pet Products a try. RP
customer_reviews.author: Ross P.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My vet's office had these as treats for patients. My puppy went nuts for them when the doctor crushed and sprinkled the chicken on the counter. He loves it! So of course, I bought the large bag. I sometimes used it to sprinkle over new kibble that I was trying to introduce to his diet. Worked like a charm. They also seem very healthy as the only ingredient is chicken. Smaller dogs (my dog is 5lbs.) may need only a portion of the chicken as some are quite large in the package. I just break off a piece if it's too large.
customer_reviews.author: Urbannite

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this!
customer_reviews.text: It took my cat a little while to like it right out of the box but now she can't get enough. The product is very powdery and this builds up in the bottom pf the bag. But I stir in room temperature water to the powder and make a soup for my cat. She loves it! My vet was very interested and I gave her a few bites to share with her dogs. My cat loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves his chicken!
customer_reviews.text: This treat is easy to handle. The pieces are larger than the brands I have bought before and can be easily broken into whatever size you wish. I feel comfortable giving a freeze dried all meat treat. Although I haven't traveled far with it I am pleased that it has not turned into chicken dust. The last brand I had would disintegrate so rapidly that about half the package was sprinkled over his food like sugar on cereal so it would not have been wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Careful shopper

customer_reviews.title: My kitties' favorite thing.
customer_reviews.text: Kitty crack. Really, just the best thing to sprinkle on kitties' dinner, to improve the flavor and aroma.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Dehydrated kitty crack--who knew
customer_reviews.text: My cat used to eat raw. Then he gorged once too often and threw it up . . . in multiple, best-not-to-be-remembered places. Thus, he no longer considers raw as suitable food. His human not only had to give away way too much organic raw meat but also had to find some sort of suitable no-starch protein to supplement his diet. Thank goodness for this stuff. He loves it. He loves it in chunks. He loves it as sprinkles. He'd probably love to snort it. Stupid cute cat.
customer_reviews.author: T. Maddox

customer_reviews.title: My friends dog is crazy for it
customer_reviews.text: My friends dog love it. My dog loves it when we are at her house but not at home but that is just her
customer_reviews.author: mary Pree

customer_reviews.title: 1/3 Bag of Powder
customer_reviews.text: The product video shows a bag being g opened and it all chunky chicken 🐔 pieces... mine wasn't!! @#^*€ ...
customer_reviews.author: Alan Z

customer_reviews.title: One cat loves it, the other cat no.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats and one cat absolutely LOVES Whole Life chicken freeze dried. It's like crack to him. The other cat won't eat it no matter what I tried. Cats are funny like that. Hopefully one day he will try it because it's wholesome and I don't mind giving out treats when it's good for them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A

customer_reviews.title: happy cats!
customer_reviews.text: If you have cats, dogs, birds, ferrets, what-have-you, you owe it to your critters to try these freeze dried chicken treats. Cats seem to prefer the chicken but this comes in turkey, beef, etc. also. Simple, plain chicken breast that has been freeze dried--that's it! After the Greenies scare I was looking for something that I could give my two voracious, growing kittens with a guilt free conscience. My two cats are crazy-nutso about these.
customer_reviews.author: anon and mouse

customer_reviews.title: They also like chunks of it as a treat
customer_reviews.text: I have finicky cats and a little sprinkle of this on their wet food keeps them interested. They also like chunks of it as a treat. I buy the largest box to get the most for my money, but it would be great if they packaged it in a couple of bags inside that box to keep it from crumbling (thus the four stars rather than five.
customer_reviews.author: Hoobie

customer_reviews.title: Please let me order smaller package.  10 oz twice !  Stuck together. Please tell manufac. thanks
customer_reviews.text: This product. 10 oz. is stuck together ! Please tell manufacturer. The smaller packages. Are fresher n not stuck together I can’t use this product. Dr j. Nyc
customer_reviews.author: jONNIE  ROCKWELL

customer_reviews.title: Healthy ‘only chicken’ that is easy to store and eat
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this is to use. Our dog likes these straight out of the bag as a snack, but we also crush up and add to dog food and add a bit of water as well. He loves it either way.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Whole Life Pet Products Freeze Dried Chicken
customer_reviews.text: First and most important, company provides excellent service, concerned, interested, takes customer feedback seriously. Had a few questions and the company responded immediately. The chicken is pure white as the picture shows. Some pieces are a little hard for cats teeth but soaking in warm water for a few minutes resolves that problem. Will buy again because my cats like it, were happy and a happy cat makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Too bad they are so expensive
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these! Too bad they are so expensive, since he can easily bamboozle me into giving him way too many. But have you ever tried to say "NO" to an Abyssinian?
customer_reviews.author: John K. Casey

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Customer!!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive for dog treats . . . but, most of us dog lovers don't think about price. With so many products coming from outside the USA, it scares us to not know what is in treats and dog food. You know exactly what you are getting with these and our two dogs love them. Since they are freeze dried, there is some powder in the package. Sprinkle this on a little dry dog food - another treat. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: marcia mehmert

customer_reviews.title: Great consistent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Very high quality and consistent quality which is the most important part. My cat loves this stuff any way he can get it. We do dry as treats, mixed in with food when he is being picky and also sometimes re-hydrated. I'm pretty sure if it came down to it I'd be willing to eat this stuff re-hydrated. Maybe a good emergency kit supply...
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: It's no savings if the product has disintigrated
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product many times in the4 oz. size and think it is the best treat for my cats. They seem to think so too. I was very disappointed when I purchased the 10 oz. size to find about 25% of the package was powdered product-possibly from shipping? Whatever the reason, I will only purchase the 4oz. product from now on.
customer_reviews.author: roam mills

customer_reviews.title: quality went to the dogs
customer_reviews.text: I've given this product to my cats in the past and they loved it. Maybe I got a bad batch this time. The pieces of chicken, which are usually light and crunchy, are hard like rocks, brownish instead of white, and our cats won't touch it. Cost a fortune too. I'm sticking to Life Essentials freeze dried chicken treats in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Wilkozoid

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look at all like chicken meat
customer_reviews.text: Looks like little chicken dry sponges. My dog really didn't like it
customer_reviews.author: Frodesen

customer_reviews.title: She's worth it
customer_reviews.text: I know that a lot of people would think that I'm a bit overboard with my little girls treats but I have to tell you that this bag is absolutely huge and it will go pretty far. I know that I feel good about what I'm giving her and that I don't have to worry about what could possibly in it that could harm her ~ and she loves it ~ of course whats not to love, all natural freeze dried chicken breast!
customer_reviews.author: AuntBic25

customer_reviews.title: True Treats for our Felines
customer_reviews.text: We had been getting these treats through a local pet outlet, however Amazon's prices have recently been better, and the dates are very good. Only reason I wouldn't rate the product higher is that we have to use it sparingly as true 'treats' because, over time, they add up to a significant part of the pet budget! Our cats would eat them like regular cat food if given the choice!
customer_reviews.author: TomO.

customer_reviews.title: Best treat ever!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this product. I have to hide it from them so they don't rip open the bag and eat it all in one setting (it happened once before, thus, the hiding of the treats).
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cats
customer_reviews.text: I know this product is basically marketed for dogs but is a great treat for cats too. I give this to my cats for a bedtime snack. I don't leave it in the whole strips instead I crumble it up very easily by hand. And I will also say that it looks like it would last longer than you think so buy more than you think, once you've decided your pets like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesy

customer_reviews.title: Best treat EVER, ideal for old cats too, and made pill-time easier
customer_reviews.text: This is now our ONLY kitty treat. Even our pickiest "I don't like treats" cat loves 'em. With chicken as the only ingredient, no issues with allergies, sensitivities or concerns over safety of minor ingredients. Soft so cats w/dental issues can easily eat, but with enough crunch to satisfy hunter instincts. Using this as a reward for pill-taking has simplified our lives tremendously: no more wrestling matches at pill-time! Expensive, but SO worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kittyshrink

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for cats
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this product. I sprinkle it overt their wet food and also as a treat. They can't get enough of it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Franco

customer_reviews.title: Healthy & delicious treat for dogs & cats!
customer_reviews.text: My Maltese love these and I feel good because they are only one ingredient: chicken breast. No added fillers, chemicals, preservatives, dyes, etc. Healthful treat for my little babies.
customer_reviews.author: SeizeTheBay

customer_reviews.title: the other cat looks at me like I've lost my mind
customer_reviews.text: Once cat LOVES these, the other cat looks at me like I've lost my mind... or like I'm trying to poison him... so can't give it a 5.. if Romeo had acted like Podi, it would be a 5! Romeo gives it a 1 Podi gives it a 5!
customer_reviews.author: Lazpash

customer_reviews.title: Very nutritous for your pet!
customer_reviews.text: Fresh and tasty treat for your pet! Great for dogs and cats!
customer_reviews.author: Dee S.

customer_reviews.title: One of my cats refused to eat even her favorite food if it doesn't have some freeze dried chicken ...
customer_reviews.text: Cat crack. One of my cats refused to eat even her favorite food if it doesn't have some freeze dried chicken on top. This brand is not quite as light and airy as Life Essentials (some of the pieces are hard and sharp), but I love that it comes in this huge size. Best not to run out.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Meowwww  Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my cat's favorite treat. I give her in late evening mixed with a little dry food, for an extra boost of protein (since it is 100% pure chicken, freeze dried.) I just break the bigger chunks in smaller pieces for her, and she devours it. You can't miss with this product--yes, it's pricey. BUT, highly nutritional--no fillers, preservatives or other junk. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: UptownGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product! And a very good price for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! And a very good price for the 21 oz package. My male cat loves the freeze dried chicken breast. He sits at his feeding tree before I go to work waiting with anticipation to be fed this treat. I definitely recommend this wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: william forsyth

customer_reviews.title: 100% YES
customer_reviews.text: My cat can't resist these treats! She would eat the entire bag if I didn't keep it in my closet. You can use 100% of the product; the powder can be mixed with water to make a gravy/paste & my cat eats it off the spoon but I usually mix it in with her dry food and she loves it. (My dads chihuahua loves them too!!)
customer_reviews.author: Hayley NJ

customer_reviews.title: Cats prefer !
customer_reviews.text: My 3 cats love this ! Very finicky and act like this is catnip. It is healthy and a great choice for a snack. Be very careful though it tends to get somewhat "powdery" and could be inhaled into their small nasal cavity.
customer_reviews.author: rsh

customer_reviews.title: Healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: Very healthy treat and loved by my cat and dog.
customer_reviews.author: Hopeful

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: Most of chicken were good quality and condition But this time more then 1/3 were little pieces and crumbs Usually bigger box has a better quality meat. But not at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Mongmong

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough great things about this product!!! You know that there are no byproducts and it's purely chicken. It's my kitties favorite snack and they go CRAZY for it. Am a devoted customer!
customer_reviews.author: Aska Taka

customer_reviews.title: Back to Being a Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: After having a bad batch of the product, I expressed my disappointment via an Amazon review. My displeasure was addressed immediately by Whole Life and remedied without any fuss. I received my new batch within 2 weeks and it is of the quality I expected. Thank you Jen G.
customer_reviews.author: HIDouble

customer_reviews.title: Our cat LOVES these!!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, good size for the price and our Savannah cat LOVES them!! I tried soaking a few in warm water and he gobbled those us too! Good for 'emergency' meal when I forget to thaw his raw foods! He hears the bag, or any similar sounding bag, and comes running!
customer_reviews.author: Will in NC

customer_reviews.title: My cats love these! These also work well in shelter cats ...
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these! These also work well in shelter cats with upper respiratory infections as they are stinky enough (especially this fish and liver ones) for kitty's with colds to smell so it induces them to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Patti F

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged treat that agrees with senior dog's sensitive stomach.
customer_reviews.text: Box was delivered well packaged in a box, rather than a padded envelope; and surrounded with bubble wrap. The freeze dried chicken arrived intact and not pulverized to powder. Nice big chunks, but soft enough for my 17.5 year old dog to enjoy. This is the one treat that agrees with his senior, sensitive stomach.
customer_reviews.author: JYM

customer_reviews.title: Best Pet Treat Ever!
customer_reviews.text: this has got the be the easiest & healthiest treat ever. Cats & Dogs Love this stuff and will do just about anything to get it! perfect for training or even to crush up over food just for something extra.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Treat
customer_reviews.text: The product is a great treat for pets - not ful of chemicals. Unfortunately, I did my last purchase from another site, since Amazon upped their price substantially.
customer_reviews.author: Coleen M Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Healthy treat.
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkies love it, not so much the cat. They are a nice heathy treat.
customer_reviews.author: Emily H

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Our Shiba Inu, Maya, loves these. First and foremost, the packaging says Made in the USA and that makes them worth buying right there. They are quite light and airy (being freeze dried) and are easy to crunch or gum for older dogs. A definite go to treat for any canine companion.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Scheh

customer_reviews.title: My cat Loves These
customer_reviews.text: My cat gets these as a boost of protein and a special treat every day. She really loves them. I rehydrate the chicken in warm water before giving them to her. My only complaint is that there is quite a bit of broken bits of powder at the bottom of the bag that are virtually useless.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Animals love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, you can see the quality compared to the competitors. My two cats and a dog love the stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Sayuri

customer_reviews.title: Freeze Dried Chicken
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it, at the appointed time they surround me in wait for their treat. The shocker is the price. At first, though expensive I bought it because it was 100% chicken. But now I have not found the original vendors and all listings have prices out of this world. So I won't buy anymore.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous da

customer_reviews.title: My cats get so happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Omg my cats love these and it’s better to buy the bigger bag more value
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: My Cats LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful, healthy high-protein treats for dogs and cats. I crush them and sprinkle them on my cats wet food to entice them to eat and break them into small pieces to give as treats. The big bag is by far the most cost effective way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Geo123

customer_reviews.title: My cat cocaine!
customer_reviews.text: This is the product that helped my cat transitioning to eat raw food...i sprinkled on top of her raw food... No more dry food..high in carbs! No more can food,full of syntetic vitamins! Natural raw 100%! Thanks to WLT! Ofcourse i woundlnt made without my vet!
customer_reviews.author: cocoa butter

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this product.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this product. HOWEVER, it is costly and by the time it gets to my house, about half of the freeze dried chicken pieces are chicken powder. This is a fragile product that doesn't stand up to much handling. Much of it is wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Marino

customer_reviews.title: Chicken powder!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these for many years. Many, many, many bags. This bag is a quarter of powdered chicken, not chunks! For the price, I would recommend that the product not be inferior. Whole Life, quality control - is it meaningful?
customer_reviews.author: F. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Best treats available anywhere
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for your precious kitties. Freeze-dried chicken pieces and nothing more! My kitties absolutely love this product. I will highly recommend Whole Life Pet Products All Natural Freeze Dried Chicken Breast for any "parent' who wants the best!
customer_reviews.author: Whysoserious

customer_reviews.title: Pets love this treat.
customer_reviews.text: Both my dog and cat love this treat. They both run to me when they see me get it out of the cabinet. I have to ration it out because I seem to go through the largest size bag every six weeks. I only wish there were more pieces and not as much chicken dust in each package. (They do love the chicken dust - it just has to be poured into their food bowls instead of being handed out as a treat.)
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. But over the years the package has stayed the same. The price has increased. Bu, very disappointing, the amount of chicken has decreased
customer_reviews.author: Myron Perreira

customer_reviews.title: I feel good, because I know it's freeze dried
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my cat and dog. They both can't get enough of it!! I feel good, because I know it's freeze dried, so it's healthy for them. Wish it wasn't so expensive, but guess that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: jkl2hud

customer_reviews.title: Excellent size. Very little powder left
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size. Very little powder left. I get much better bang for the bucks!
customer_reviews.author: M. Crosby

customer_reviews.title: YES EXPENSIVE but its Quality Product FOR SURE !
customer_reviews.text: THIS STUFF IS THE REAL THING < JUST CHICKEN > and stores well ! EASY TO USE , and my dogs love it , YES EXPENSIVE but its Quality Product FOR SURE !
customer_reviews.author: BOSTON PEEPLES

customer_reviews.title: Freeze Dried Chicken
customer_reviews.text: My cats go nuts for these. It's like kitty crack. They are finicky creatures who sometimes go off their food, so I save the dust at the bottom of the bag and sprinkle it on, and suddenly the food is all new to them.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

product_meta.title: Whole Life Pet Healthy Dog and Cat Treats Value Pack, Human-Grade Whole Chicken Breast, Protein Rich for Training, Picky Eaters, Digestion, Weight Control, Made in the USA, 21 Ounce
product_meta.description: The World’s First “Farm to Friend” Treats Protein rich, grain free, all natural pet treats that are light in weight and heavy in nutrition. At Whole Life Pet, the journey starts on the farm and ends with your best friend. We use 100% human grade ingredients sourced only in the USA from farmers, fisherman and food artisans that we work with directly. We never use chemicals, additives, preservatives, grains, glutens, fillers, or anything artificial. We freeze dry our treats to remove excess moisture, concentrate natural flavor and maintain full nutritional value. We passionately make every treat in house, testing and verifying the safety of each batch before ever putting them in the bag. The result…We like to think we make the highest quality, safest, best tasting pet treats on earth.
feature_bullets: 100% natural with no chemicals additives or preservatives ever
Every batch quality and micro tested for safety
Guaranteed to please even the most finicky dogs
New vacuum sealed bag and outer box locks in freshness and eliminates breakage and dust
Every batch safety tested before ever being put in the bag
